mapper.select: SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , GRCODE_CD , CODE , CODE_NM , SYMD , EYMD , '' AS SEQ , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTme AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VCOMCommonCode_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , Unit as LOCATION_CD , Solar as YMD , HolidayName as HOLIDAY_NM , IsHoly as FESTIVE_YN , ISNULL(IsPaid,'') as PAY_YN , LastDateTime as CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VPRHoliday_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , WkItemSeq AS GNT_CD , WkItemName AS GNT_NM , '' AS GNT_GUBUN_CD , '' AS HOL_INCL_YN , '' AS REQUEST_TYPE_CD , '' AS WORK_YN , ISNULL(IsPaid,'') AS PAY_YN , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VPRWkItem_ISU
SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , DeptName AS ORG_NM , BegDate AS SYMD , EndDate AS EYMD , '' AS ORG_TYPE , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDADeptInfo_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , DeptName AS ORG_CHART_NM , BegDate AS SYMD , EndDate AS EYMD , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , UppDeptSeq AS PRIOR_ORG_CD , '' AS SEQ , '' AS ORG_LEVEL , '' AS ORDER_SEQ , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VHROrgDeptInfo_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , EmpId AS SABUN , EmpName AS EMP_NM , EmpEngName AS EMP_ENG_NM , EntDate AS SYMD , RetireDate AS EYMD , TypeSeq AS STATUS_CD , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , '' AS LOCATION_CD , UMJdSeq AS DUTY_CD , UMJPSeq AS POS_CD , UMPgSeq AS CLASS_CD , '' AS JOB_GROUP_CD , JobSeq AS JOB_CD , '' AS PAY_TYPE_CD , '' AS LEADER_YN , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpInfo_ISU ORDER BY EmpId, EntDate
SELECT CompanySeq AS ENETR_CD , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , EmpId AS SABUN , '' AS SYMD , '' AS EYMD , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpInfoMulti_ISU
SELECT CompanySeq AS ENETR_CD , EmpId AS SABUN , Cellphone AS EMAIL , EMail AS EMAIL , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpAddInfo_ISU
SELECT CompanySeq AS ENETR_CD , EmpId AS SABUN , WkItemSeq AS TAA_CODE , WkDateFr AS SYMD , WkDateTo AS EYMD , '' AS SHM , '' AS EHM , '' AS IF_APPL_NO , '' AS STATUS FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpAddInfo_ISU
